title: Greyhound Lines
summary: Greyhound Lines, Inc., usually shortened to Greyhound, is an intercity bus common carrier serving more than 3,800 destinations across North America. The company's first route began in Hibbing, Minnesota, in 1914 and the company adopted the Greyhound name in 1929. Since October 2021, Greyhound is a subsidiary of German transportation company Flixmobility, but has been based in Dallas, Texas, since 1987. Greyhound is the largest motorcoach operator in the United States.[4]
